-| wb(wf(cres(cdoma, c0), c0, c1), wa(wfn(cres(cdoma, c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cfv(cres(cdoma, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(carw, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wf(cres(cdoma, c0), c0, c1), wa(wfn(cres(cdoma, c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cfv(cres(cdoma, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))))
-| diffsc(hs0, cres(cdoma, c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(cres(cdoma, c0), c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, cfv(carw, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| diffsc(hs0, cres(cdoma, c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((domA |` c0): c0 → c1)
⊣ c0 =(Arrow ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ d(hs0,(domA |` c0))
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c1)

body.origin: |- diffsc(hs0, cres(cdoma, c0))

-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((domA |` c0): c0 → c1)
⊣ c0 =(Arrow ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c1)

body.origin: |- diffsc(hs0, c0)

|- wf(cres(cdoma, c0), c0, c1)

-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))

⊣ d(hs0, c1)

comment: The domain function is a function from arrows to objects. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
